item.title: Apple finally allows game emulators in the App Store
item.description: Finally gaming emulators are now permitted on Apple devices. I’ve just downloaded the Delta app for iPhone and it’s awesome, runs really smoothly Apple App Store: Delta - Game Emulator Links & further details PlayStation, GameCube, Wii, and SEGA Emulator for iPhone and Apple TV Coming to App Store What to Know About Apple Allowing Game Emulators in the App Store NES Emulator for iPhone and iPad Now Available on App Store Delta Game Emulator Now Available From App Store on iPhone The first gaming emulators are now on the iOS App Store
item.content:encoded:
Finally gaming emulators are now permitted on Apple devices. I’ve just downloaded the Delta app for iPhone and it’s awesome, runs really smoothly

  • Apple App Store: Delta - Game Emulator

Links & further details

  • PlayStation, GameCube, Wii, and SEGA Emulator for iPhone and Apple TV Coming to App Store
  • What to Know About Apple Allowing Game Emulators in the App Store
  • NES Emulator for iPhone and iPad Now Available on App Store
  • Delta Game Emulator Now Available From App Store on iPhone
  • The first gaming emulators are now on the iOS App Store
